{id:game-description}A test of reflexes!: A test of reflexes! Avoid the blue stingers while sending fireballs at the boss!
{id:game-description}Adventure through l: Adventure through levels collecting jewels and avoiding obstacles!
{id:game-description}Controlling a stars: Controlling a starship, both players will destroy the Galga forces, while avoiding enemies. Each player has 3 lives, game ends once a player runs out of lives.
{id:game-description}Eat the leaves to g: Eat the leaves to grow, but watch out for walls!
{id:game-description}Explore multiple le: Explore multiple levels of caves deep within the earth, but watch out for those cave caterpillars!
{id:game-description}Fly through the dan: Fly through the dangerous rooftops and ledges of New York City delivering messages!
{id:game-description}Fly through the sky: Fly through the sky avoiding obstacles
{id:game-description}Fly your plane over: Fly your plane over the forest spraying water to put out the fires!
{id:game-description}Go on a mouse adven: Go on a mouse adventure in a haunted castle, battling bad guys, avoiding obstacles and collecting keys!
{id:game-description}Help your bunny hop: Help your bunny hop over obstacles as they run through the forest
{id:game-description}Navigate your hot a: Navigate your hot air balloon through the mountains avoiding birds and spaceships
{id:game-description}Place arrows along: Place arrows along the path to help Asphodel the witch find their way
{id:game-description}This is a cooperati: This is a cooperative game where both players share lives. You must defeat skeletons, collect hearts and avoid the ducks and fishes.
{id:game-description}Time to practice yo: Time to practice your football throwing game! Coordinate plays and avoid defenders
{id:game-description}Two strawberries ba: Two strawberries battle it out in the kitchen to be the Shortcake Star!
{id:game-description}Ultimate battle bet: Ultimate battle between cats and dogs! The player who succeeds in placing three of their marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row is the winner as the best pet.
{id:game-description}Use the lasers on y: Use the lasers on your spaceship to shoot falling asteroids!
{id:hardware-description}A fun-sized con: A fun-sized console to play the games you code.
{id:hardware-description}A programmable: A programmable modular console to create games, design wearables and make creative projects.
{id:hardware-description}A retro game co: A retro game console for STEM education from Kittenbot team
{id:hardware-description}ARCADE is a pro: ARCADE is a programmable gamepad for use with MakeCode Arcade.
{id:hardware-description}It's a badge, i: It's a badge, it's an arcade, it's a PyBadge
{id:hardware-description}It's the PyBadg: It's the PyBadge with a zest of Machine learning
{id:hardware-description}Learn how Brain: Learn how BrainPad Arcade lets you run games on a small handheld console.
{id:hardware-description}Learn how to ru: Learn how to run your games on micro-controllers from Adafruit
{id:hardware-description}The Retro has a: The Retro has a big screen, colorful protective case, d-pad and vibration motor
{id:hardware-description}Use the micro:b: Use the micro:bit with an expansion board from Elecfreaks
